item.title: Setting to avoid python and anaconda conflict using pyenv and pyenv-virtualenv
item.description: Introduction I have been using pyenv only to switch versions of python in local environments. However, recently I have used anaconda more often. Since ptyhon and anaconda conflict when executing activate command, I decided to use pyenv-virtualenv. Goals I want to switch python version in one machine I also want to switch the python distribution (anaconda in this case) I want to resolve conflict between anaconda and pyenv when I execute activate command When I activate anaconda, I do not execute the command with full path 1 and 2 are pyenv, and 3 can be solved with pyenv-virtualenv.
